alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:38AM MST until March 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon, Red Lodge Foothills, and Southern Big Horn. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to the snow and poor visibility. This includes the Monday morning commute. Young livestock may be at risk from the cold and wet conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some roads will be wet today, then freeze quickly in the late afternoon and early evening. Expect icy conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn
